showScoreExcerpt: "It's even better than I remembered. 'Hamilton' is something entirely new to Broadway. And also something entirely old...You'll leave 'Hamilton' humming. And teary-eyed. And in awe that someone - Lin-Manuel Miranda in this case - can conceive of, write, and star in something so moving, so compelling, so...well, genius."

keyPhrases.quote: You'll leave 'Hamilton' humming. And teary-eyed. And in awe
something so moving, so compelling, so...well, genius
It's even better than I remembered

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Unqualified praise using superlatives like 'genius' and describing profound emotional impact, with the critic calling it 'entirely new to Broadway' and expressing pure awe. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses unqualified enthusiasm and admiration for the show, indicating it is a must-see experience.
